name: Mölkky Pistelaskuri
description: User-friendly web application designed to help you keep track of your Mölkky game scores. Built using Vue.js, this tool ensures an easy and efficient way to manage your game statistics, enhancing your Mölkky playing experience.
showDesc: Helps you keep track of your Mölkky game scores.

name: Shared Notes
description: Dynamic web application that allows users to create and share notes with others. Utilizing the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) and JWT for secure authentication, this platform facilitates seamless collaboration and note sharing.
showDesc: Allows users to create and share notes with other users.

name: Leikkai
description: Mail subscription service designed for an upcoming clothing brand. Developed with Next.js and TypeScript, this application enables users to subscribe and receive updates about the latest collections and news from Leikkai.
showDesc: Mail subscription service for my friend's upcoming clothing brand Leikkai.

name: Speed Tester
description: Fun and interactive game that tests your reaction speed. Built with React and TypeScript, this application provides a challenging and engaging experience to improve your reflexes and reaction time.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Simple yet engaging Tic Tac Toe game developed using React and TypeScript. It allows two players to compete in a classic 1vs1 match, offering a straightforward and enjoyable gaming experience.

name: adnanavni.dev
description: My personal portfolio website, showcasing my projects, skills, and professional journey. Developed with Next.js and TypeScript, this site serves as a comprehensive introduction to my work and expertise.

name: Catchmaster
description: Collaborative project created for a web development course at Metropolia UAS. This fishing app, built with React, TypeScript, GraphQL, and MongoDB, allows users to share and document their fishing trip experiences.
showDesc: Fishing app where users can share experiences from their fishing trips.

name: Jobel
description: Platform developed for a web development course at Metropolia UAS, enabling users to share their thoughts anonymously. Utilizing the MERN stack and JWT for authentication, it provides a secure and open space for expression.
showDesc: A place where you can share your thoughts anonymously!

name: Expense Tracker
description: Project designed to help users manage their expenses efficiently. Developed with Java, JavaFX, MariaDB, Maven, and JUnit, this application offers a reliable way to track and analyze your spending habits.
showDesc: Helps you keep track of your expenses!

name: Dots
description: Straightforward application exploring the use of React. It serves as a simple yet effective demonstration of React's capabilities, focusing on basic interactive features and components.

name: Ski resort simulator
description: Group project from Metropolia UAS, simulating events and operations at a ski resort. Developed with Java, JavaFX, MariaDB, Maven, and JUnit, this application provides a detailed simulation experience.
showDesc: Stimulates the events that happen in a ski resort.

name: Animated Landscape
description: Visually appealing project featuring a CSS animation of a landscape scene. Optimized for a 1920x1080 screen resolution, it showcases the capabilities of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in creating animated visuals.
showDesc: A CSS animation of a landscape scene

name: Ylös-Ulos-Helsinki
description: Website created for a group project at Metropolia UAS. It helps users find activities and events in Helsinki, utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to provide an informative and user-friendly interface.
showDesc: A website that helps you find activities in Helsinki.

name: Vesihiisi
description: Water consumption tracking app developed for a group project at Metropolia UAS. Built with Java and Android Studio, it helps users monitor and manage their daily water intake.
